meaning_str.bing:
adj. 精确的；准确的；严谨的；严格的
v. 要求；索取；迫使；强迫
网络. 确切的；精密的；真确

精确的；准确的；严谨的；严格的

准确的；精确的；确切的；严格的；精密的；严谨的；严密的；一丝不苟的；精细的；无误的
强求；勒索；索取；要求；强迫；迫使；强制；施加压力以取得；强行获得

1.en: Since the goal of the article is to exemplify the consumption of a JMS message, we skip over the exact implementation of the workflow.
1.cn: 本文的目标是演示如何使用JMS消息，因此我们将跳过工作流的具体实现。

2.en: Yes, Sanders, in a few days (9 to be exact) things will suddenly change for you as if you were about to start from scratch.
2.cn: 是的，散沙，在几天（9是精确的）之内事物将会突然为你改变好像你正要从头开始。

3.en: I knew this bride who was absolutely exact on every detail of her wedding. I remember thinking "Calm down, its just a Wedding. "
3.cn: 我认识的这个新娘也是完全专注于婚礼上的每一个细节，我不禁会这样想“冷静点吧，只不过是个婚礼罢了。”

1.en: Those were your exact words? They were.
1.cn: 你当时就是这么说的吗？的确。

2.en: He's gonna do the same exact thing that I said.

3.en: I hate not having the exact same schedule as you.
3.cn: 我们俩的课表不一样好讨厌啊。

4.en: Odd, President Seibert posed the exact same question.
4.cn: 真奇怪，塞伯特校长也这么问我。

5.en: When the exact same genes reappear in the exact same order, it is for us what you would call reincarnation.
5.cn: 当同样基因以相同序列重新出现，就是你们所谓的轮回。

6.en: What did you say? Ah, I believe my exact words were...
6.cn: 那你说什么？我相信我的回答是…

7.en: Hey, you know what? My Grandma had the exact same bag.
7.cn: 我外婆有个一模一样的包包。

8.en: I had the exact same conversation. You did? What was he talking about?
8.cn: 我也跟他谈过。是吗？他到底在说什么？

9.en: Turns out, glaucoma and having hair stuck take the exact same prescription.
9.cn: 事实证明，青光眼和头发被卡住都可以用同一处方解决。

10.en: But I know that if he were here, he would be telling you the exact same thing.
10.cn: 如果他在这儿，我相信他会跟你说一样的话。

11.en: He was sympathetic. His exact words were: "Got your back, Jack. Bitches be crazy."
11.cn: 他很是同情，他的原话是"哥们挺你，兄弟，妞儿们都疯了"。

12.en: How would you determine the ground state of a quantum system with no exact solution?
12.cn: 在没有精确解的情况下，你如何确定量子系统的基态？

13.en: Well, I never really thought of it in those exact terms, but, generally speaking, yes.
13.cn: 我不会这么说，但是你的意思也没错。

14.en: 14. Hit me. Oh my God. May I just say that you two gentlemen have the exact same hands.
14.cn: 14点。再加。天啊，两位的手一模一样。

15.en: No, for once in my life, I can say without a shadow of a doubt, I am in the exact right place.
15.cn: 我有生之中第一次毫不疑惑地说出这就是我该来的地方。

16.en: Talk, and if you are wasting our time... Did you know this church is in the exact center of the city?
16.cn: 说吧，如果你敢浪费我们的时间...你们知道这座教堂位于城市正中吗。

17.en: Gene, I want the same overcoat for Peter. I mean the exact same one that Obama wore, and Alicia, too.
17.cn: 吉恩，为彼得弄一件相同的大衣和奥巴马那件完全一样的大衣，艾丽西娅也要一件。

18.en: So beat the bushes. What were Dani Littlejohn's exact movements from her swim until the time of her death?
18.cn: 那就去调查一下，达妮·利特约翰从游泳后到死亡前到底去了哪些地方？

19.en: You know the paving slabs in that whole area, even the exact ones that he landed on, you know they were all…
19.cn: 你也知道，那一整片混凝土路面，他砸中的那块也是，你也知道那里。
